title: Planning for Retirement
description: This chapter explores retirement planning strategies, including different retirement accounts, the relationship between risk and return, and how to develop a personalized retirement strategy based on individual goals and time horizons.
learning_objectives: Differentiate between saving and investing strategies
Identify key financial concepts like liquidity, risk tolerance, and opportunity cost
Explain the relationship between risk and return
Develop financial strategies based on time horizons and goals
Understand how diversification helps manage risk
Compare different retirement accounts and their features
